price: Nígbà tí wọ́n bá rí ọjà kan tàbí ìranù kan, wọn yóò dà lọ síbẹ̀. Wọn yó sì fi ọ́ sílẹ̀ lórí ìdúró. Sọ pé: “N̄ǹkan tí ó wà ní ọ̀dọ̀ Allāhu l’óore ju ìranù àti ọjà. Allāhu sì l’óore jùlọ nínú àwọn olùpèsè.
arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡاْ تِجَٰرَةً أَوۡ لَهۡوًا ٱنفَضُّوٓاْ إِلَيۡهَا وَتَرَكُوكَ قَآئِمٗاۚ قُلۡ مَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهۡوِ وَمِنَ ٱلتِّجَٰرَةِۚ وَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرُ ٱلرَّٰزِقِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
